name: Welcome to Computer Science at REALM / Spring 2015
tagline: Intro to Python @ REALM Charter School in Berkeley, CA
body:
# Hello, World.
This class is taught by Christina Jenkins at REALM Charter High School in Berkeley. This semester-long course is an introduction to programming in Python, and will cover variables, functions, lists, loops, and conditionals. We'll do several projects along with daily exercises and weekly quizzes. 
## Unit 1: Variables, types, calculations, string operations
***
* Unit 1 Daily Lessons [are available here.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/tree/master/Unit1_Lessons_Variables)
* Unit 1 Daily Exercises [are available here.](https://github.com/REALM-CS/python/tree/master/Unit1_Exercises_Variables)
* **Unit 1 quiz I on Friday, 1/9**: Variables, types, calculations
* **Unit 1 quiz II on Thursday, 1/15**: Variables, string operations
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
